Token.Abstract: This protocol defines the interface to the SBBConsentManager's non-constructor, non-initializer methods. The interface is abstracted out for use in mock objects for testing, and to allow selecting among multiple implementations at runtime.

Submit the user's "signature" and birthdate to indicate consent to participate in this research project. (Deprecated: use consentSignature:forSubpopulationGuid:birthdate:signatureImage:dataSharing:completion: instead.)
Token.Declaration: - (nonnull NSURLSessionTask *)consentSignature:(nonnull NSString *)name birthdate:(nonnull NSDate *)date signatureImage:(nullable UIImage *)signatureImage dataSharing:(SBBParticipantDataSharingScope)scope completion:(nullable SBBConsentManagerCompletionBlock)completion

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The user's name.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: The user's birthday in the format "YYYY-MM-DD".

Parameter.Name: signatureImage
Parameter.Abstract: Image file of the user's signature. Should be less than 10kb. Optional, can be nil.

Parameter.Name: scope
Parameter.Abstract: The scope of data sharing to which the user has consented.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: An SBBConsentManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Submit the user's "signature" and birthdate to indicate consent to participate in this research project.
Token.Declaration: - (nonnull NSURLSessionTask *)consentSignature:(nonnull NSString *)name forSubpopulationGuid:(nonnull NSString *)subpopGuid birthdate:(nonnull NSDate *)date signatureImage:(nullable UIImage *)signatureImage dataSharing:(SBBParticipantDataSharingScope)scope completion:(nullable SBBConsentManagerCompletionBlock)completion

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The user's name.

Parameter.Name: subpopGuid
Parameter.Abstract: The GUID of the subpopulation for which the consent is being signed.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: The user's birthday in the format "YYYY-MM-DD".

Parameter.Name: signatureImage
Parameter.Abstract: Image file of the user's signature. Should be less than 10kb. Optional, can be nil.

Parameter.Name: scope
Parameter.Abstract: The scope of data sharing to which the user has consented.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: An SBBConsentManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Retrieve the user's consent signature as previously submitted. If the user has not submitted a consent signature, this method throws an Entity Not Found error. (Deprecated: use getConsentSignatureWithCompletion:notConsented: instead.)

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: An SBBConsentManagerRetrieveCompletionBlock to be called upon completion.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Get the user's consent signature as previously submitted. If the user has not submitted a required consent signature, the SBBBridgeAppDelegate method handleUserNotConsentedError:sessionInfo:networkManager: will be called if it has been implemented in the app delegate, just before calling the completion handler.

Parameter.Name: subpopGuid
Parameter.Abstract: The GUID of the subpopulation for which the consent signature is being fetched.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: An SBBConsentManagerGetCompletionBlock to be called upon completion. See the documentation of that block type for details on what is passed to it under various circumstances.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Withdraw the user's consent signature previously submitted. This has the effect of withdrawing them from the study altogether. (Deprecated: Use withdrawConsentForSubpopulation:withReason: instead.)

Parameter.Name: reason
Parameter.Abstract: A freeform text string entered by the participant describing their reasons for withdrawing from the study. Optional, can be nil or empty.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: An SBBConsentManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Withdraw the user's consent signature previously submitted for a specific subpopulation.

Parameter.Name: subpopGuid
Parameter.Abstract: The GUID of the subpopulation for which the consent signature is being withdrawn.

Parameter.Name: reason
Parameter.Abstract: A freeform text string entered by the participant describing their reasons for withdrawing from the study. Optional, can be nil or empty.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: An SBBConsentManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.

Token.Abstract: Email (again) the consent document signed by the user when consenting as a member of a particular subpopulation.

Parameter.Name: subpopGuid
Parameter.Abstract: The GUID of the subpopulation for which the consent document is to be emailed.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: An SBBConsentManagerCompletionBlock to be called upon completion.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLSessionTask object so you can cancel or suspend/resume the request.
